title: Mykhaylo Kopolovets
text: Mykhaylo Kopolovets (born 29 January 1984) is a Ukrainian former professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who is most known for playing for <a href="FC%20Hoverla%20Uzhhorod">Zakarpattia Uzhhorod</a>, <a href="FC%20Karpaty%20Lviv">Karpaty Lviv</a> and <a href="FC%20Mynai">Mynai</a>.
